about_the_game:
Combine the tried and tested with the modern! The new FAA container wagons used in the UK bring new colour to your fleet.
In addition to various weather options, this trolley provides brand new containers that are compatible with the standard 20ft / 40ft container industry.
Matching sound, detailed textures and compatibility with the ACS coupling system complete this car.

Features:

- FAA (UK) wagon with detailed textures
- supports default 20ft / 40ft industry with new containers
- modern sound
- different weathering settings
- ACS compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
